content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option the anna m pattern is a tribute to anna mäkilä s raitaa ja ruusua /patterns/library/raitaa-ja-ruusua socks which introduced me to the sweet tomato heel structure by cat bordhi i took the liberty to further modify the heel to my taste **pattern features ** - knitted toe up - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - striped tomato heel with small gussets before and after the heel - chart but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork - pattern tech edited / proof read by helena kahan 1 https //payhip com/b/gdoye
